Table	Create Table
email_accounts	CREATE TABLE `email_accounts` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `user_id` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `email` varchar(320) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `imap_host` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `imap_port` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '993',
  `imap_username` varchar(320) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `imap_password` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `notification_email` varchar(320) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `is_active` enum('active','inactive') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'active',
  `last_checked_at` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  KEY `email_accounts_user_id_users_id_fk` (`user_id`),
  CONSTRAINT `email_accounts_user_id_users_id_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`) REFERENCES `CTvyHTDriMTH88WXuMkTqz`.`users` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE NO ACTION
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci AUTO_INCREMENT=30001
